creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
markings: LRQ, round relief; below signature: 箐々 {Seisei}
medium: Fan, mounted as hanging scroll, ink and color on paper
text: Floral motifs form a significant part of the Rinpa school’s canon of subjects. In a composition that skillfully makes use of the limited space, Sekka captures a hollyhock in an abbreviated and simplified way typical for Rinpa.
title: Hollyhocks
